title: Metal Mage
description: This magical world is about to have an industrial revolution. 1 - Get pulled from a life of 20th century boredom and thrust into a fantasy world. 2 - Find out there are a bunch of powerful monsters and evil wizards intent on killing everyone. 3 - Use new magical powers of earth and metal to craft awesome armor, swords, and GUNS. 4 - Kill the bad guys, become a hero, and have a harem of hot women.
author: Eric Vall
